subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: After stumbling through World Cup qualifying and losing its Four Nations tournament opener, the United States beat host China, 2-0, to win its first warm-up for next summer’s Women’s World Cup in Germany.
snippet: After stumbling through World Cup qualifying and losing its Four Nations tournament opener, the United States beat host China, 2-0, to win its first warm-up for next summer’s Women’s World Cup in Germany.
